name: A Story From the Sky [Early Demo]
name_original: A Story From the Sky [Early Demo]
description:
Controls Keyboard:
Q: Rapidfire
W: Powerup
E: Pistol
Arrowkeys: Movement
Arrowkey Up: Jump

Controls Gamepad:
RB: Rapidfire
LT: Powerup
RT: Pistol
Left Joystick: Movement
A: Jump


This is an extremely unfinished demo for people to test the game mechanics.
The demo will be updated regularly, follow the twitter to keep informed!

feedback and suggestions in the comments or @storyfromthesky would be appreciated!

https://www.justgiving.com/fundraising/A-Story-From-the-Sky

follow us on twitter
